item.title: Pandora and Proxychains
item.description: Background Pandora doesn’t work outside the states I keep forgetting how to set-up proxychains Proxychains Technically this article expects proxychains-ng, which seems to be the more up-to-date fork of the original proxychains. Install proxychains-ng # I am on archlinux.. sudo pacman -S proxychains-ng Copy the configuration to the $HOME directory cp /etc/proxychains.conf . Edit said configuration to add some US-based proxy In my particular case, I don’t keep the tor section enabled.
